calendarView.title: calendar
calendarView.subTitle: view
calendarView.description: GooseTrack's Calendar view provides a comprehensive overview of your schedule, displaying all your tasks, events, and appointments in a visually appealing and intuitive layout.

sidebar.title: sidebar
sidebar.description: GooseTrack offers easy access to your account settings, calendar, and filters. The "My Account" section allows you to manage your profile information and preferences, while the calendar provides a quick and convenient way to view your upcoming events and tasks.

allInOne.title: all in one
allInOne.description: GooseTrack is an all-in-one productivity tool that helps you stay on top of your tasks, events, and deadlines. Say goodbye to scattered to-do lists and hello to streamlined productivity with GooseTrack.

loginPage.description: Quickly come in and write down your tasks for the day!

signUpPage.description: Quickly register and familiarize yourself with the application!
signUpPage.minLengthName: Name should contain more then 2 characters
signUpPage.minLengthPass: Password should contain more then 5 characters

chengePassPage.minLengthPass: Password should contain more then 5 characters

VerifySuccessPage.description: Congratulations! Your email has been successfully verified! Please login to continue using our application.

ResendVerifyEmailForm.textInstruction: Type in the email you used to register in GooseTrack.
ResendVerifyEmailForm.text: We'll send you a link to finish you verification.

sendMailForgetPass.textInstruction: Type in the email you used to register in GooseTrack.
sendMailForgetPass.text: We'll send you a link to create your new password.

header.motivateSecond: of the past and focus on the present!

userProfilePage.title: User Profile
userProfilePage.changePassword: Do you want to change password?

modal.description: In connection with the change of e-mail, it is necessary to verify the new address. Our letter has already been sent to your new email address.

validation.validName: The max length of the username is 16 characters
validation.validPhone: The phone number must be in the format 380xxxxxxxxx
validation.validTelegram: The max length of the Telegram username is 16 characters

taskForm.timeFormat: Time format must be in HH:MM format
taskForm.timeAlert: End time must be later than the start time
taskForm.priority: Priority should be low, medium or high
taskForm.dateFormat: Date format must be in YYYY-MM-DD format
